attributes.action: Intervene and reject the Isle of Wight Councils ill thought out and experimental education plans for 14 to 19 year old students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The present proposals for teaching children from 14 to 19 are a gamble. 

They fail to address any of the real problems by using a smoke screen of reorganisation to hide behind.

They are untried anywhere else.

They will be very disruptive to children who are presently in the education system.

They will make it almost impossible to recruit high quality teachers to the Island in the future.

In conclusion I do not feel the councils proposals are well thought out or meet the needs of the Islands students.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
